snippet: For the second consecutive year, Turkey is imprisoning more journalists than any other country, according to a report from the Committee to Protect Journalists released Wednesday.
abstract: Committee to Protect Journalists releases report saying that, for a second consecutive year, Turkey has imprisoned more journalists than any other country.
lead_paragraph: For the second consecutive year, Turkey is imprisoning more journalists than any other country, according to a report from the Committee to Protect Journalists released Wednesday.
